reviews.text: We stayed one night at this hotel and thoroughly enjoyed our visit. The hotel room was very comfortable, dinner was terrific and Keith and Sheila were great hosts. The 15 minute walk down to the Spey river is a relaxing after-dinner stroll. If you enjoy scotch whiskey, be sure to take advantage of Keith's knowledge and recommendations.
reviews.title: Great hotel and restaurant
Excellent!!
reviews.text: We had the pleasure of spending a few days at this hotel recently. The owners, Keith and Sheila were excellent hosts. The decor is beautiful, we also had our meals in the restuarant which were superb!! We will certainly be back and would highly reccommend this lovely hotel The Wilsons Glenrothes

reviews.title: Simply The Very Best
reviews.text: We stayed in Grantown on Spey just two nights at the Ravencourt House Hotel and wished it could have been longer.
The owners could not have been more accommodating . The hotel and the grounds were breath taking.
reviews.title: Excellent
